BENTELER

## We are metal processing specialists. With passion. We love the material, the processing opportunities it offers and the products created with it.

[Read more](https://www.benteler.com/en/about-benteler/who-we-are/ "Read more")

Latest news

## Our latest news    and press releases

13.05.2025

Improving energy efficiency in the production process at the Valladares plant (Vigo) of BENTELER AUTOMOTIVE VIGO, S.L.


BENTELER AUTOMOTIVE VIGO, S.L. has carried out various operations at its facilities in the Valladares Industrial Estate in Vigo (Pontevedra) to improve the energy efficiency of its production process.

[More](https://www.benteler.com/en/press-media/latest-news/improving-energy-efficiency-in-the-production-process-at-the-valladares-plant-vigo-of-benteler-automotive-vigo-sl/ "More")

![](https://www.benteler.com/fileadmin/_processed_/9/8/csm_01_Header_News_Media_Neutral_575f3e392e.png)

30.04.2025

BENTELER Charity Tournament 2025: Around $80,000 raised for a good cause


BENTELER Steel/Tube concluded successfully its 4th annual charity golf tournament, held on April 25, 2025.

[More](https://www.benteler.com/en/press-media/latest-news/benteler-charity-tournament-2025-around-80000-raised-for-a-good-cause/ "More")

![](https://www.benteler.com/fileadmin/_processed_/b/a/csm_Golf_Tournament_4710cf7bfe.jpg)

29.04.2025

New CEO for HOLON: Markus Schlitt takes the lead on the road to series production


Markus Schlitt will become CEO and Managing Director of the joint subsidiary of the BENTELER Group and TASARU Mobility Investments as of May 1, 2025.

[More](https://www.benteler.com/en/press-media/latest-news/new-ceo-for-holon-markus-schlitt-takes-the-lead-on-the-road-to-series-production/ "More")

![](https://www.benteler.com/fileadmin/_processed_/1/c/csm_Markus_Schlitt_ff09931679.png)

29.04.2025

Innovation under high pressure: BENTELER develops 500-bar fuel line


Even in an electrified world of mobility, combustion technology remains relevant - especially for plug-in hybrids. In 2024, around 14 million engines with high-pressure injection were produced in China alone.

[More](https://www.benteler.com/en/press-media/latest-news/innovation-under-high-pressure-benteler-develops-500-bar-fuel-line/ "More")

![](https://www.benteler.com/fileadmin/_processed_/3/c/csm_500bar_WebsiteHeader_62def578ab.jpg)

03.04.2025

Claudia Freitag to become CFO of BENTELER Steel/Tube


Claudia Freitag, currently Vice President of Finance and Controlling at BENTELER Steel/Tube, will assume the role of Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of the division as of July 1, 2025.

[More](https://www.benteler.com/en/press-media/latest-news/claudia-freitag-to-become-cfo-of-benteler-steel-tube/ "More")

![](https://www.benteler.com/fileadmin/_processed_/2/0/csm_Claudia_Freitag_6f6a430e0e.jpg)

[Find more news](https://www.benteler.com/en/press-media/latest-news/ "Find more news")

### The book of pioneers

### The book of pioneers

With their outstanding commitment and ideas, it’s our employees that make the difference at BENTELER. For our customers and for our partners.

How exactly? What motivates our Driven Professionals around the world? In our Book of Pioneers, they share their stories, one by one. Check back regularly to discover new, inspiring narratives from our employees and get an authentic, first-hand look at the many facets of BENTELER.

[Read more](https://www.benteler.com/en/about-benteler/who-we-are/#c799 "Read more")

Your selection from

The controller (BENTELER International Aktiengesellschaft, Austria) would like to use the following services in order to process your personal data. Technologies such as cookies, localStorage, etc. can be used for personalization. This is not necessary for the use of the website, but allows us to interact with you more closely. Please select, if appropriate, the following options:

Analysis / Statistics (1 Service)

Absolutely necessary technical services. No consent necessary.

Switch to accept or reject the category Analysis / Statistics

* * *

Google Analytics (via Google Tag Manager)

Google LLC, USA

[All Detailsto Google Analytics (via Google Tag Manager)](https://www.benteler.com/en/#)

[All Detailsto Google Analytics (via Google Tag Manager)](https://www.benteler.com/en/#)

Switch to accept or reject the service Google Analytics (via Google Tag Manager)

Personal data is processed when you visit this website. Processed data categories: technical connection data of the server access (IP address, date, time, requested page, browser information)data about the use of the website and the logging of clicks on individual elements. Purpose of processing: Anonymization and creation of statistics, analysis of user behavior and content optimization. The legal basis for processing: Your consent according to Art. 6 (1) a GDPR. Data is transmitted: to the data controller Google LLC, Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA. The legal basis for the data transfer to Google LLC is Your consent according to Art. 6 (1) a GDPR. This may also mean a transfer of personal data to a country outside the European Union. The data is transferred to the USA on the basis of Art. 45 GDPR in conjunction with the European Commission's adequacy decision C(2023) 4745, since the data recipient has committed to comply with the data processing principles of the Data Privacy Framework (DPF).

via Google Tag Manager

Personal data is processed when you visit this website. Processed data categories: technical connection data of the server access (IP address, date, time, requested page, browser information). Purpose of processing: Triggering, controlling and managing other services on our website. The legal basis for processing: a legitimate interest that overrides the rights and freedoms of the data subject (Art. 6 (1) f GDPR). Legitimate interests: strong economic interest in safe and functioning operation of the technical systems, Compliance with legal and contractual obligations. Data is transmitted: to the data processor Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland. This may also mean a transfer of personal data to a country outside the European Union. The data is transferred to the USA on the basis of Art. 45 GDPR in conjunction with the European Commission's adequacy decision C(2023) 4745, since the data recipient has committed to comply with the data processing principles of the Data Privacy Framework (DPF).

Processed data categories: technical connection data of the server access (IP address, date, time, requested page, browser information)data for creating usage statistics. Purpose of processing: avoid non-human and automated input. The legal basis for processing: Your consent according to Art. 6 (1) a GDPR. Data is transmitted: to the data controller Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland. The legal basis for the data transfer to Google Ireland Limited is Your consent according to Art. 6 (1) a GDPR. This may also mean a transfer of personal data to a country outside the European Union. The data is transferred to the USA on the basis of Art. 45 GDPR in conjunction with the European Commission's adequacy decision C(2023) 4745, since the data recipient has committed to comply with the data processing principles of the Data Privacy Framework (DPF).

Instagram

Meta Platforms Ireland Ltd., Ireland

[All Detailsto Instagram](https://www.benteler.com/en/#)

[All Detailsto Instagram](https://www.benteler.com/en/#)

Switch to accept or reject the service Instagram

When accessing some sub-services of our website, additional personal services are processed. Processed data categories: technical connection data of the server access (IP address, date, time, requested page, browser information)data about the use of the website and the logging of clicks on individual elements. Purpose of processing: Selection of online advertising on other platforms, which are automatically selected using real-time bidding based on user behavior and provision of social media services. The legal basis for processing: Your consent according to Art. 6 (1) a GDPR. Data is transmitted: as joint controllers for Meta Platforms Ireland Ltd., 4 Grand Canal Square, Grand Canal Harbour, Dublin 2, Ireland. This may also mean a transfer of personal data to a country outside the European Union. The data is transferred to the USA on the basis of Art. 45 GDPR in conjunction with the European Commission's adequacy decision C(2023) 4745, since the data recipient has committed to comply with the data processing principles of the Data Privacy Framework (DPF).

Purpose of processing: Triggering, controlling and managing other services on our website. The legal basis for processing: a legitimate interest that overrides the rights and freedoms of the data subject (Art. 6 (1) f GDPR). Legitimate interests: strong economic interest in safe and functioning operation of the technical systems, Compliance with legal and contractual obligations. Data is transmitted: to the data processor Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland. This may also mean a transfer of personal data to a country outside the European Union. The data is transferred to the USA on the basis of Art. 45 GDPR in conjunction with the European Commission's adequacy decision C(2023) 4745, since the data recipient has committed to comply with the data processing principles of the Data Privacy Framework (DPF).

Switch to accept or reject the service YouTube

When accessing some sub-services of our website, additional personal services are processed. Processed data categories: technical connection data of the server access (IP address, date, time, requested page, browser information)data for creating usage statistics. Purpose of processing: Delivery of content provided by third parties, Selection of online advertising on other platforms, which are automatically selected using real-time bidding based on user behavior and transmission and display of video content. The legal basis for processing: Your consent according to Art. 6 (1) a GDPR. Data is transmitted: as joint controllers for Google Ireland Limited, Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland. This may also mean a transfer of personal data to a country outside the European Union. The data is transferred to the USA on the basis of Art. 45 GDPR in conjunction with the European Commission's adequacy decision C(2023) 4745, since the data recipient has committed to comply with the data processing principles of the Data Privacy Framework (DPF).
